nodes.bodyText: Should we add the same helper method in the tagging feature? If so, could you add this feedback in the PR?

I'm not sure whether you mean literally this helper method or a similar one for tagging. The latter is already in the PR:

  
    
      java-spanner/google-cloud-spanner/src/main/java/com/google/cloud/spanner/Options.java
    
    
         Line 81
      in
      c3be7ce
    
    
    
    

        
          
           public static ReadQueryUpdateTransactionOption tag(String name) { 
        
    
  


But I don't think we should add this specific helper method to the other PR. The two PR's are going to conflict, but I think that is something we should fix once one of them has been merged.
Oh sorry, I missed that from the other PR.
This change will break customers and requires a major version bump. This is not optional.

This is no longer a breaking change, as the breaking changes that were needed for this and other changes were grouped into a separate change to avoid having to bump the version multiple times. That change added Options... options varargs to the methods that need to support a variety of query / update / transaction options.
